1.2.0.en: fixed an issue where min/max values were not respected, option to manually set the amount of digits of the result, improved homey v4.x compatibility

1.3.0.en: Live testing, time based query works on all splines, small fixes and improvements

1.3.1.en: Live testing, time based query works on all splines, small fixes and improvements, improved iOS compatibility

2.0.0.en: Upgrade to SDK v3, confirmation required for deleting a spline

2.1.0.en: The latest calculation value of each spline is available as a global drop token, flow cards to directly store the spline calculation result into a logic variable, improved drop down behaviour
